Frontend Developer

About

I enjoy using such technologies as HTML5, CSS3, jQquery, Git. I have developed websites on Github Pages using Jekyll. Besides I have skills in Adobe Photoshop, Pixelmator and VSCode programs. My usual environment is Mac OS X or Ubuntu Mate.
My code is easy-to-understand and clean. I work hard to to keep my customers satisfied. Doing everything on time with high quality is very important for me. I always get new knowledge to improve my skills.
